description: Front-End Test Task: E-commerce Collection Page Background:     Imagine you are a Front-End Developer for an E-Commerce business that specializes in selling snowboards. The company wants to create a collection page showcasing all the products. Your task is to propose and implement front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a smooth, engaging user journey. Task Description:     Goal:         Create a simple Ecommerce collection page that fetches product data from an API and displays it on the UI on a button click with proper animations. Requirements:     Fetch Data: Use JavaScript to make a GET request to the provided API endpoint.                 https://interveiw-mock-api.vercel.app/api/getProducts Display Products: Load the products on the page with HTML and CSS. Each product should display essential details like:     Image     Product Name     Price     Description Products should animate in a staggered manner.     Basic Styling: Apply CSS to ensure the products look, and animate as per the Figma attached below. Matching the UI Design is a mandatory requirement.     Optional Enhancement: Implement a filter feature - Sort by price and re render the UI with the same animation as when products were loaded.
